name: run_command
description: Executes the provided terminal command in the current workspace context; internal commands (`cd`, `pwd`, environment commands) are handled internally. Append ` | cat` for interactive or pager commands to prevent hanging, and set `is_background` to True for long-running processes; external commands may modify workspace files.

command.description: The exact terminal command string to execute; append ' | cat' for interactive or pager commands.

is_background.description: If `True`, runs the command as a background process (e.g., for servers or watchers); defaults to `False`, running in the foreground and waiting for completion.
